= 3.x Working branch =

The current working branch for the Alfresco (Extension + SHARE) 3.0 ready release is:

http://maven-alfresco-archetypes.googlecode.com/svn/branches/3.0.0
http://maven-alfresco-archetypes.googlecode.com/svn/branches/3.0.0-stripped

It features Maven Calm, a framework for Application Lifecycle Management on Maven. See more info here: http://code.google.com/p/maven-calm.

We should consider merging this branch.

= Trunk =

Trunk is at 

http://maven-alfresco-archetypes.googlecode.com/svn/trunk

It's the 1.1.x archetype version and it's been recently upgrade to support Alfresco 3.0Stable release.
